column1: Eradan is one of the three main characters of The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. He is a Dúnedain and was born before  in the Angle (Eriador). He was both a skilled swordsman and archer
column2: and a great tracker. He is voiced by Nolan North.

column1: ==History==
===Youth===
The ancestors of Eradan were members of a noble family from Númenor
column2: who served Elendil. After the Downfall of Númenor they went in exile to Middle-earth and lived in Arnor
column3: where they served the Kings of Arnor. After the fall of that kingdom they continued to serve the Chieftains of the Dúnedain.

column1: File:The Lord of the Rings- War in the North - Concept Art of Eradan1.pngEradan spend his youth in a small Dúnedain settlement in the Angle (Eriador)
column4: served Aragorn as an Rangers of the North. While Baranor and a company of Dúnedain patrolled the Misty Mountains he didnt return. After the loss of his father
column5: Eradan was fostered by his uncle

column1: ===Life as a Ranger===

After he was grown up he started his training to be a Ranger. After only two years he completed his training and started to fight the Orcs of the Misty Mountains and Trolls who roamed the east of Eriador. Eradan gained a high reputation as swordsman and archer
column2: and his skills as outdoorsman and tracker were exceptional high.

column1: When Aragorn doubled the defenses of the Shire Eradan served as one of the guards of Sarn Ford for many years under the command of Halbarad. In  3016 Aragorn became more active in the Shires defense. In this time Eradan impressed Aragorn with his skills and bravery. Eradan accompenied Aragorn on many of his travels
column2: on which Aragorn taught him even more about tracking. In  he met Farin (video game character) and Andriel as they joined the guards of the Sarn Ford.

column1: ===War of the Ring===
File:The Lord of the Rings War in the North - Aragorn
column3: Andriel and Farin in the Prancing Pony.png
column4: Eradan and Farin (video game character) meet Aragorn in the Prancing Pony.When the Nazgûl attacked the Sarn Ford all three fought under the command of Halbarad in an attempt to prevent them entering the Shire. They were defeated and most of the rangers were killed. After the attack
column6: Andriel and Farin saw and overheard a meeting between the Witch-king and Agandaûr. Agandaûr told the Witch-king he had assembled an army of Orcs and Goblins in Fornost.

column1: Halbarad sent the three to Bree
column2: where they meet with Aragorn in the Prancing Pony. They tell Aragorn what happened
column4: where they have to stop Agandaûrs army before it attacks Bree.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: After arriving in Fornost they are attacked by several groups of Orcs and Goblins and find a chained Eagles. After Eradan and his companions helped him to escape
column2: he introduces himself as Beleram and explains how he has been captured.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column4: Main Gate In regards of his rescue
column5: Beleram decides to help them stop Agandaûr.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: In the inner wards of Fornost the companions meet with Elladan and Elrohir
column2: whove been sent by Elrond to scout Fornost. Andriel introduces Eradan and Farin to Elladan and Elrohir. After finding out theyre appointed to deal with the same task
column3: the two groups decide to work together. Firstly Elladan and Elrohir lead Eradan and his friends to the citadel
column4: but latter on they take seperate roads.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column6: Inner wards But meet again - after surviving several ambushes - at the gate of the citadel. The gate of the citadel has been protected by Agandaûr with magic. As the sons of Elrond use all their power and concentration to remove the magical protection
column9: Farin and Beleram protect them against an attack of Orcs and a Troll.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: Inside the Citadel tower the group overhear a conservation between Agandaûr and Tharzog
column2: who informs the earlier about intruders. Here
column4: Andriel and Farin are again seperated from the sons of Elrond. The earlier fight and kill Tharzog and his guard. After which they proceed to the top of the tower
column5: where they find Agandaûr fighting the sons of Elrond. Agandaûr - seeing he is outnumbered - flees on a Fell Beast. Although Beleram chases him
column6: he has to give up after Agandaûr creates a thunderstorm.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: ==Family Tree==
==Skills==
One of his most unique skills is envision
column2: which allows him to move undetected behind enemies and attack them in the flank. He fights with both a bow and a sword
column3: and is good in tracking enemies.http://asia.gamespot.com/?tag=header%3Blogo Gamespot Asia

column1: ==Appearance==
File:Eradan of the week - 9 November.png 2011.Although Eradan is only his thirties he looks older
column2: because of his life in the wilderness. The player is able to change and customize the look of Eradan.
